snippet: Tesla is innovating in self-driving cars, solar energy and fast people-movers, but has a cash-flow problem. Apple is seen as lagging in ideas, but is flush with dormant money.

headline.main: How Tesla and Apple Could Be Good for Each Other

snippet: With countries cracking down on elaborate tax schemes, companies need to be more forthright with their own investors.
abstract: Op-Ed article by investment banker Morris Pearl criticizes Securities and Exchange Commission for considering scaling back disclosure requirements on companies, saying move would hurt public and investors like himself; underscores how necessary it is for investors to have as much information as possible about companies engaged in high-risk tax avoidance schemes.

headline.main: How Companies Like Apple Dodge Taxes and Their Own Investors

snippet: McLaren damped down a report on Wednesday that Apple Inc had made an approach for the British Formula One team owner and supercar maker.

headline.main: Supercar Maker McLaren Says Not in Discussion With Apple
headline.print_headline: Supercar Maker McLaren Says Not in Discussion With Apple

snippet: BlackBerry Ltd has agreed to offer anti-hacking software from a startup that last year discovered a major Android bug, it said on Wednesday, as the once-dominant smartphone company seeks to leverage ties to corporate and government clients to boos...

headline.main: BlackBerry to Resell App From Startup That Found Major Android Bug
headline.print_headline: BlackBerry to Resell App From Startup That Found Major Android Bug

snippet: “The Gefilte Manifesto” and “Le Marais” go well beyond the usual brisket or roast chicken.

headline.main: Two Cookbooks Offer Fresh Approaches for Rosh Hashana
headline.print_headline: To Consult: Fresh Approaches for Rosh Hashana

snippet: Google wants to add a middleman to your mobile chats — a personal virtual assistant who's not shy about interjecting itself into the conversation.

headline.main: Google's Allo Chat App Is Clever _ Just Not All That Smart
headline.print_headline: Google's Allo Chat App Is Clever _ Just Not All That Smart

snippet: Google-parent Alphabet Inc launched Allo, a messaging app that incorporates Google's search feature and a chatbot that uses machine learning to "improve" itself over time.

headline.main: Google Launches Allo, Bets on AI to Spice Up Chats
headline.print_headline: Google Launches Allo, Bets on AI to Spice Up Chats

snippet: U.S. carrier Verizon Communications Inc has begun taking orders for Samsung Electronics Co Ltd's new Galaxy Note 7 smartphones, after having stopped sales of the device earlier due to fire-prone batteries.

headline.main: U.S. Carrier Verizon Starts Taking Orders for New Samsung Note 7 Phones
headline.print_headline: U.S. Carrier Verizon Starts Taking Orders for New Samsung Note 7 Phones

snippet: Researchers have identified a Canadian company at the center of a small Arab nation's online censorship system — a finding that sits awkwardly with Ottawa officials' public support for digital freedoms.

headline.main: Researchers: Canadian Firm Helping Bahrain Censor the Web
headline.print_headline: Researchers: Canadian Firm Helping Bahrain Censor the Web

snippet: Liu Jingtang was a Samsung loyalist. The Shanghai technology consultant traded up steadily through its smartphones to the new Note 7. But Liu's devotion was shaken by the Korean tech giant's confusing response to its latest product safety scare.

headline.main: Samsung Suffers Backlash in China Over Smartphone Response
headline.print_headline: Samsung Suffers Backlash in China Over Smartphone Response
